title: UN called on to establish international corruption court (Anti-Corruption Commission of Bhutan)
text: ( Source : Anti-Corruption Commission of Bhutan ) The Global Organization of Parliamentarians Against Corruption ( GOPAC ) has called on the United Nations to establish an international court on corruption following the issuance of the
